metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3803 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
nth-check is vulnerable to Inefficient Regular Expression Complexity

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3803` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-nth-check - 1.0.1-1+deb10u1build0.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: node-nth-check package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-1+deb10u1build0.18.04.1').
